<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lifesense](/Feats.aspx?ID=5753) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=579" />
<trait label="Duskwalker" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=751" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 49 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You have a limited ability to sense life force, like your [psychopomp](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=458) forebears. You gain [lifesense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=67) as an [imprecise sense](/Rules.aspx?ID=412) with a range of 10 feet. This allows you to sense the life force of living and [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=722) creatures within the listed range. The sense can distinguish between the vitality energy animating living creatures and the void energy animating undead creatures, much as sight distinguishes colors.
name: Lifesense
